snippet: The Islanders will play their final five games of the regular season on the road as they seek their first N.H.L. playoff berth since 2007.
abstract: New York Islanders will play their final five games of the regular season on the road as they seek their first NHL playoff berth since 2007.
lead_paragraph: The Islanders will play their final five games of the regular season on the road as they seek their first N.H.L. playoff berth since 2007.

headline.seo: Islanders’ Quest for the Playoffs Is a Road Show
headline.main: Isles’ Road to Playoffs Is Barnstorming Tour
headline.print_headline: Isles’ Road to Playoffs Is Barnstorming Tour
